amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds by HUD for super vouchers.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to implement, administer, or enforce paragraph (c)(3) of section 982.503, Code of Federal Regulations.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Schock amendment (A050) Agreed to by recorded vote: 210 - 209 (Roll no. 290).
